decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings titled: LOCATION PLAN, Design and Access Statement, 025_001_Rev.A, 025_002_Rev.A, 025_G320_Rev.B, 025_G310_Rev.B, 025_G211_Rev_B, 025_G212_Rev_B, 025_G213_Rev_B
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application form and the plans as listed in Condition (2).

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B, 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1, 1.2, 2.1 and 2.10, policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the Cuckoo Estate Conservation Area Management Plan. | No windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the buildings.

Reason:  To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and be of conservation style and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

REASON: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), D6 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and Cuckoo Estate Conservation Area Management Plan.
description: Single storey side to rear extension, two storey side extension; roof extension to rear (main) roof slope
